title: Much cheaper in retail stores
review: after a lot of research in online stores , I visited the local retail shop and to my amazement I got this product for Rs.4300 only , better discount than what is here .

title: Not Bad
review:
My mom bought this from a shop. This is, to be honest, not the very best. But there are some plus points too.
Pros.
1. Good design
2. Less space needed
3. Less sound motor
4. Strong blades
5. Fast grinding
6. Good finishing in the base unit (Main body)
7. Super extractor is good. Dont have to get the hands wet
8. The second most decent mixer in the market.

Cons
1. Poor quality plastic in handle
2. No finishing in jars
3. The dome tops are funny and their gothic design that makes it looks vulgar
4. Contents spill out with that sleak top cap. (The solution is to remove that sleak top cap      and place Dom top cap and do the wet grinding. Never spills out the contents)
5. Grind and store is totally useless. they could have made that chutney grinding jar a bit more big.
6. Super extractor is useless if you have a good juicer.


Panasonic is the best mixer. But no commercials on TV, so we get a bit hesitant. Before buying the mixer, go and just window shop these both brands. You will know the difference between Panasonic and Preethi. My mom preferred Preethi Because 'Preethi is cute ...!' Preethi is feminine in looks. But those who want perfection in functioning and looks, go for the masculine Panasonic.

title: Not a good mixer
review:
Bought this mixer last week and could not find it useful. Jars are not good and they spill. Small jar used for making chutney is pathetic and do not grind properly. 

So be careful while buying this. I have already replaced it with Panasonic and have to see the performance of new mixy :)

title: Pathetic Mixer and grinder
review:
I purchased mine around 4 months back from a local shop.
Usability of this mixer grinder is very very low.

1) Liquid spills from all the jars, whether small one for chutney or when we try to amek tomato puri in the steel jar. Motor and power may be good but what is the point when you can't use it.

2) Dry grinding is good.

3) Super extractor is just a gimmick. All the pulp of fiber slips through bottom and get mixed with the juice. Then what is the point of trying to use it, might as well use the blender.

Just 4 month old and I am already looking for replacement to it's usability.

title: good product
review: Definitely its a good product, it takes less time and v.easy cleaning. But we should take care of small cap which is given for the big jar as it is too small... Flipcart did a good job by early and safe delivery...v.carefully packed

title: GOOD PRODUCT FROM GOOD SELLER
review:
I love this mixie which have no problem all the time. i using this mixer grinder for more than 6years still now it is working good. this one i bought for my brother in law. good packing safe delivery. 
i am happy to shop with Flipkart

title: Best mixer grinder
review:
The best mixer grinder I have ever used. Earlier I had Philips one but jar blades went bad in no time.

Preethi one is the best. Can grind any item in no time. My sister has been using it since last 7 years with no issue ever faced. I have the same experience since I have purchased it.

title: Nicely priced.. wonderful Mixer from Preethi
review: Best for chutney... thats the primary reason that we bought this machine. There is also a cheaper one available with one attachment less. My relatives recommended it and I am happy I listed to them. @750 watts a powerful machine...

title: Ok  but Noisy
review:
I would prefer a silent mixer like the phililps.
Just because of word of mouth i purchased. Else i would preffer a silent mixer.
This one is too noisy.

title: Flipkart replaced the product and I am satisfied
review: I am satisfied with flip-kart replacement policy'. Good product. Though sound of motor is little different then normal :)

title: Good Buy
review: So far so good. I haven't had any issues with the product. However i realized quite late that there is  a preethi pro with a 1300 Watt power .. to do stuff faster. Good service from FlipKart as usual.

title: Never Buy this product
review:
Bought this product 2 weeks back and found the following problems

1. It gets heated so quickly
2. Liquid spills out from all the jars
3. No finishing on the plastic parts
4. Even though the motor is powerful, grinding performance is just average 

Overall its a below average product.

title: Not Good
review: I had a 10 year old preethi mixer which was working well and Now it is replaced with Preethi Platinum . Now really disappointed with its performance. jars are leaking rotating plug of jars broken , heavy noise. Quality of the  preethi went down drastically

title: Not worth the huge price
review: I bought this product from flipkart in May 2015. Its just 5 months and was surprised to see the blade of the wet grinder broke into two pieces last weekend while grinding dosa batter. The lid of the jars also not good and do not fit properly as it doesn't have the holding clips and spills all over the place while grinding. The design of the white chutney jar again is not good. The chutney spills over and goes in between the grooves of the jar thus causing difficulty in cleaning. Would never recommend this product to anybody and would myself not repeat the mistake of ordering an expensive electronic item online again !

title: Fair
review: Within 2 years the mixer grinder went bad...

title: Highly recommended
review:
Good Product. 
Timely delivery thanks to flipcart

title: Worth the money
review: Really good product at reasonable price. Flipkart must rectify  delivery issues

title: Mind-blowing purchase
review: This preethi mixie is very good and performing very well in our kitchen

title: Flipkart the best way to grab gud deals
review: Very nice product working nicely and delivered in advance by Flipkart Excellent service by Flipkart

title: Good choice
review:
Good product but not the best.
2 out of 4jars spills liquid content.. And the motor sound is too much,can't able to concentrate on other work when this mixer works

title: Awesome
review: Product is in good condition and working without any problems. Delivery was on time

title: Terrific
review:
After a searching for soo many products I choose to buy this mixer. Received it in a good packing mode. No damages. Thanks to flipkart for the excellent delivery.
The product is superb with its performance. Go for it

Worth for money....

title: Just wow!
review: Great product and quite happy with the performance of the product. the juice extarctor needs to be handled carefully as it can be broken when dropped from certain height as it's plastic

title: Not recommended at all
review: Extremely dissatisfied with the product. Not sure if this one is a defective product or if this is how this all of them work. Doesn't grind properly even after running for a longer duration and all jars leak. Unable to  get in touch with seller / flipkart for return.

title: Not that good. Don't go by the name.
review: I got Preethi Mixie going by its brand name. The quality of the materials used is very bad. It's been one month now and the gasket in the smallest jar snapped off and the blade in the medium size jar is rusting. The blade is made of some cheap steel. Bad experience.

title: Good
review: Everything was gud but sound is high

title: Excellent product.
review: Its been more than a month I have been using this product and no issues so far. Please make sure you read the features on the product description before buying the product.

title: Highly recommended
review: I received the product on 21st october 2017 and the product as seen in the picture. It is working with high power. I highly recommend this product for this price.

title: Must buy!
review: Great mixer. Good power. Nothing magical about mixer. It will serve the purpose without any compliants. You can go for it.

title: Hated it!
review: Flipkart taking too much time for delivery. Flipkart people thinks online buyers are waiting for 24  hours for Flipkart delivery persons. Mostly big billion day time they sending broken products or duplicate products under the name of Flipkart. So people might aware of Flipkart complaint policy or government readdressal person contacts.

title: Good quality product
review: This is excellent. But makes little noise, apart from that everything is good.

title: Decent product
review: Good product. All the jars are good and strong. Container can be used to remove pickles and chatnies. Over all rating is satisfied but prices are suddenly hiking and reducing

title: Pretty good
review: I received it two days late than the expected delivery date but anyhow am happy with the quality of the product. I already used the same model for eight years and i loved the quality. It was the best mixer ever but it wouldbe nice if i get it in different colours atleast a black because after prolonged use, it changed into bit Yellowish coz white colour needs more cleaning and wiping.

title: Good choice
review: Verfy good product for daily use

title: Worth the money
review: mixer was delivered superfast and kudos to the Flipkart team , i removed a star because of the screws inside a jar was not properly tightened and because of that it spills

title: Best in the market!
review: Product is in good condition with Invoice and Warrenty. Courier timeline mentioned is not met. Delivery was delayed and there is no information why it is delayed. Only after searching the correct contact person in online, i could able able to track the order to receive it. It should be improved.

title: Very Good
review: Good product. Best for wet grinding[grinding rice and coconut gravy]. Very quick and fine grinding in few minutes. I loved it.
